Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
20.08.2014 SH SCR19033 Moved handling 'New document' to higher program level to achieve proper program behaviour

01.09.2008 SH SCR13916 Button Specification: Added update BTCP_HYPA_ID and

of next payment

User(0) always if the payment can be closed

additional corrent booking (payment) is stored

update of storno payment with BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT
19.05.2006 SH SCR10673 Changed test "Client not allowed for curency"
05.05.2006 SH SCR11152 Removed test BTCP_HYPA_ID = 0 from storno part
20.04.2006 SH SCR10673 Added update of BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH (current
payment) with BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH *-1 of selected storno payment
12.04.2006 SH SCR10807 Added new test if exchange difference > 5 then
BTPC_CHECKCODE = 3
11.04.2006 SH SCR10673 Removed test on BTCP_BADP_ID > 0 for updates of
BTCP_AMOUNTCURRC in the storno part
05.04.2006 SH SCR10807 Added test for acknowledgement if
the difference between actual rate and entered rate is > 10 %
1. Disabled BTCP_AMUNTCOSTCURRACC for modifications
2. Extended test "Client not allowed for curency" with " or CLNT108_ACC_CURR <>
BTCP_CURRENCYCLNT
3. Extended the storno part with a new message ""Storno not allowed because
correct next payment does not exist" and extended the storing of current and
next BTCP row
09.03.2006 SH SCR10598 Changes acc. to BTCP_CURRENCYPAY modificati. and disabled
fields to modify payment amount/currency if client currency <> general currency
19.01.2006 SH SCR9755 Added new fields BTCP_ROWADDEDBYUSER and
BTCH_ROWCHANGEDBYUSER incl. updates if payment was changed
12.01.2006 SH SCR10003 Added new test "Client not allowed for curency" if
BTCH_BTCHCODE = cheques and client curency <> client currency of previous
entered / selected client
11.01.2006 SH SCR9988 Added GB007 to inform users that client has END status if
OPH202A is started and BTCP_CLNTNO_INITIAL has CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 2
29.12.2005 SH SCR9911 Disabled button "Invoices" in case of selected debtor
where DEBC_DATDELETED <> null
13.12.2005 SH SCR9748 Added test that after an invoice search and auto. start of
BPH104, the debtor from invoice serach is used to start OPH202B, instead of the
debtor client which is detected by using BPH104.PO.DEBH_NO
12.10.2005 SH SCR8912 Added test if inactive clients were selected by junior
users to handle a payment
10.10.2005 SH SCR8912 Added deletion of MQ101 for current batch
07.10.2005 SH SCR9205 Added new button "Specifications"
05.09.2005 SH SCR9004 Extended test to enable "Unallocated" with
BTCH_CODETYPEACCOUNT <> 5 or null and added new test "Client not allowed
for this currency" (=PH0255)
13.07.2005 SH SCR8473 Added new arguments for BPH104 and BPH106
29.06.2005 SH SCR7753 Changed OPH202A to give error if users enters/selects an
legal collection debtor, payment handling except move to new batch not allowed.
17.05.2005 SH SCR8315 Changed test on CLNT316_PAYMENTSONSPECADM = 'Y'
from ERROR to INFO
07.04.2005 SH SCR8081 Added new test on client, it's not allowed to use clients
where CLNT316_PAYMENTSONSPECADM = 'Y'
10.03.2005 SH SCR7852 If a new BTCP was created, only for corrections,
then BTCH_NUMBERANNEXESTOSCAN is increased with +1 now
04.03.2005 SH SCR7889 Added new button "Client info" (call --> OSP006)
14.02.2005 SH SCR7753 Fixed bug, see remark from 01.02.2005
14.02.2005 SH SCR7752 Renamed button 'Client info' in 'Debtor info'
01.02.2005 SH SCR7761 Fixed bug if hotkeys were pressed while the cursor was
on a control which was changed, see SCR for more details
01.02.2005 SH SCR7753 Added extended handling for legal collection debtors
31.01.2005 SH SCR7752 Added new button Client info
06.01.2005 SH SCR 7532 Added new test, ask for confirmation if bankcosts > 10%
of payment amount
20.12.2004 SH SCR7558 Display "This is a legal collection debtor" also now if
BTCP_DEBH_NO/BTCP_DEBC_DEBC initially exists, before only displayed if
one of the fields were changed by the users
06.12.2004 SH SCR7465 Added new parameter PI.DOCSCAN, will be used if new
BTCP row written to DB for correction batches
15.09.2004 SH SCR6982 Added module to undo "Scanning prepare" actions if
BTCP_ANNEXECSTOSCAN was set from TRUE to FALSE (only if BTCP_HYPA_ID>0)
14.09.2004 BT SCR6715 don't reducing active screen if user have only one screen.
12.10.2004 ----------> added: only for germany.
06.09.2004 SH SCR6971 Changed handling for intercredit clients
02.09.2004 SH SCR6943 Added new argument to call for OPH202B6
PI.PROGRAM_ID = 'OPH202B'
02.09.2004 SH SCR6031 Enabled debtor fields for intercredit clients
20.08.2004 SH SCR6031 Switched dev version to prodution
18.08.2004 SH SCR6855 Removed test on CLNT317_DIRECTPAYMENTLETTER
12.07.2004 SH SCR6031 Implementation of proper handling for already booked
19.05.2004 SH SCR6262 Added new test "Payment is not fully handled yet" if
BTCP_STATUS <> 2 of the selected BTCP row for storno
17.05.2004 SH SCR6249 Display INFO "This is a legal collection debtor" also if
new debtor was selected with buttton "Search debtor" and "Search invoice"
20.04.2004 SH SCR6031 Disabled field BTCP_BANKID and BTCP_BANKACCOUNT if
BTCP_STATUS = 1 to prevent differences
06.04.2004 SH SCR5904 Added new button "Send message", ==> call to OMQ900
02.03.2004 SH SCR5624 Fixed bug for function 'Delete bookings',
- BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH was not substracted with BTCP_AMOUNTCURRPAYMENT
03.02.2004 SH SCR5417 Added test that bookings could be only deleted if
- BTCH_STATUS = 0.
13.01.2004 SH SCR5267 Reduced selection of DEBC rows with DEBC_DATDELETED = NULL
12.01.2004 SH SRC5161 Init BTCP_STORNO_CAKCHELLERCOSTS with
- BADP_BANK_STORNO
07.01.2003 SH SCR5229 Added task "Delete Invoice notes" in the "Delete booking"
05.01.2004 SH SCR5177 Enable function "Delete Bookings" also if BTCP_STATUS = 1
- and extended the "Delete bookings" part with updates to BTCH and BTCP
17.12.2003 SH SCR5095 Print heading lines for textviewer only if GSET_YESNO <>
- 'Y' (GSET_ID = 10)
17.12.2003 SH SCR5089 Added new test 'PH1073'; "Storno not allowed for payments
- from old system", if BTCP_STORNO_BTCH_ID = 1
15.12.2003 SH SCR5041 Added BADT_NUMDAILYSTATEMENT to "Statement" in HEADER
10.12.2003 SH SCR5024 Extended test to inform user if "This is a legal
- collection debtor" with GSET_YESNO = 'Y' (GSET_ID=7)
26.11.2003 SH SCR4555 Fixed bug for STORNOS
19.11.2003 SH SCR4430 Removed white spaces at the left side if TXT file will be
- produced for the textviewer
17.11.2003 SH SCR4555 Added special handling for STORNOS, see SCR for details
17.11.2003 SH SCR4742 Added new field on first screen "Statement date"
1. Remove leading zeros from entered invoice numbers
2. Added info "This is a legal collection debtor"
3. Create content for textviewer onyl if it's not a correction batch
4. Removed task to close batch, call instead the new program
"OPH 202A_005 Close BATCH"
10.11.2003 SH SCR4615 Uses v.DEBH_NO_FROMBPH104 now to call OPH202B
- directly, if auto. handling was not possible.
07.10.2003 SH SCR4496 Set debtor values of active payment = debtor values of
- selected storno payment, if storno is allowed; added new check if
- DEBC_DATDELETED = NULL, otherwise paymenthandling not allowed
24.09.2003 RR SCR4411 Modified update on BTCP_AMOUNTCOSTSCURRACC
10.09.2003 SH SCR4329 Disable test on BTCP_DEBC_DEBC and BTCP_DEBH_NO
- if button "Differeneces" was pressed
05.09.2003 SH SCR4255 Enable button "Differeneces" if debtor fields are emtpy
25.08.2003 SH SCR4131 If OPH202A was called from OPH201 - Specification and
- BTCP_STATUS = 1 and BTCP_ANNEXESTOSCAN only will be changed
- then v.WhatToDoMain will be set to '', otherwise OPH202A comes into
- an endless loop
18.08.2003 SH SCR4097 Changed behaviour of function "Search nvoice", if an
- debtors was detected, "Automatic test" will be started auto.
12.08.2003SH SCR4078 Set cursor on field "invoicenumbers" if program started
11.08.2003 SH SCR4060 Added check to start BPH250 and updated BTCH_STATUS = 1,
- only if BTCH_STATUS = 0, if <> 0 user get a message
05.08.2003 SH SCR3778 Added new test on CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 2 if
- a new client was selected or entered --> paymenthandling not allowed.
05.08.2003 SH SCR3760 Added new parameters, uses to dispaly the client/debtor of
- the previous handled payment; Added new button "Differences", the same as in
- OPH202B.
13.06.2003 SH SCR3755 Removed Updated BTCH_USERIDENTERED = AS400
12.06.2003.SH SCR3702 The update of BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH +
- BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH, which will be performed in the final booking part
- has to be executed now only if BTCP_STATUS = 0, because BPH106 will do the
- same updates, if the payment was completely handled and then the updated
- of BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH will be done twice and the batch can close
- because there is a difference between BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH and
- BTCH_TOTABATCHH
08.05.2003 SH SCR3508 If an intercredit client was selected with "Search debtor"
- OPH202B will not be opened directly, OPH202A will be opened with this client
05.05.2003 SH SCR3414 Implemented new function "Split payment"
17.04.2003 SH SCR3357 The IO-File used for the textviewer, will be deleted now
- before the new IO-File will be produced, otherwise if a payment does not have
- descriptions the previous descriptions will be displayed
09.04.2003 SH SCR3288 After coming back from OPH202D now there is a check
- if the payment could be closed, therefore I implemented a new task to get
- the actual BTCP amounts, which were calculated by OPH202D and BPH113
09.04.2003 SH SCR3283 Start debtor search if "Name search" was pressed in
- OSP007
07.04.2003 SH SCR3284 The entry of invoice number limited to 110 characters and
- entries will be converted to uppercase and the function "Test automatic" could
- be started alternativ with the key "End"
-- 1. Print paymentamount and currency into textviewer
-- 2. Changed CLNT312_MAXAMOUNT in CLNT313_MAXAMOUNT and
CLNT312_MAXPERCENTAGE in CLNT313_MAXPERCENTAGE
-- 3. BTCP_ADMNO_INITIAL and BTCP_CLNTNO will be initialized with the values
from the previous payment , only for corrections relevant
27.03.2002 SH SCR3217 Removed CND to enabled checkbox "Unallocated"
- BTCP_BADP_ID > 0 and BTCP_CURRENCYACC = GNRL_CURRENCY
20.03.2003 RR SCR3195 -> Implementation of shortcut handling
17.03.2003 SCR3161 SH Give errormeassage and do not leave OPH202A if button OK
- was pressed and payment could not handled yet
14.03.2003 SCR3098 SH If a BTCP_STORNO_BTCH_ID or BTCP_STORNO_LINE_NO was
- entered the payment could be handled / closed. This was only be done if both
- fields were empty before. Now it's also possible that the USER is able to
- change a BTCP_STORNO_BTCH_ID or BTCP_STORNO_LINE_NO
13.03.2003 SCR3150 SH If BTCP_DEBC_DEBC is emtpy or '0' table DEBC will not be
- obtained and also the auto. insert function will be disabled
24.02.2003 SCR3067 SH Disabled the following actions to handle a payment if a
- STORNO_BATCHID was entered: 1. Book unallocated, 2. Move to new batch,
- 3. Button Invoices, 4. Button Buying groups, 5. Test automatic
18.02.2003 SCR3014 SH If BTCP_AMOUNTCURRACC <> 0 then it is not allowed that
- BTCP_AMOUNTCURRPAYMENT = 0 --> implemented to errorhandling
10.02.2003.SCR2960 SH Activate Rapid data entry for the hole OPH202 programs
- (allows " +" Key = TAB, "PgDn" Key = New line)
05.02.2003 SCR2930 SH Disabled storno fields, book unallocated and
- move to new batch if already a BTPC exist for the current payment
30.01.2003 SCR1793 SH Call GM100 --> Switch 7. argument to FALSE to disable
- the start of the DesktopReader with GB100 and made some changes in
- argumentlist of GM100..
28.01.2003 SH SCR2758 Enlarged CND to check ADMNO/CLNTNO with BADP_
- UNALLOCATED = 'N', not needed for unallocated payments
05.11.2002 SCR2469 Disabled all buttons (not "OK" and "Cancel") if the user
- entered a client with CLNT212_INTERCREDIT ='Y'
23.10.2002 SCR2005 Add selectionlist to BTCP_STORNO_BTCH_ID and some checks if
- a BTCP_STORNO_BTCH_ID was selected (F5) or entered
14.10.2002 SCR2359 SH If there are already booked invoices disable fields
- BTCP_UNALLOCATED and BTCP_MOVETONEWBATCH and it's not allowed to change the
- client from an intercredit client to an non intercredit client or backwards
09.10.2002 SH Changed list of arguments for BPH113 according to new SPECS
08.10.2002 SCR2178 SH If BTCH_CODE = GNRL_BATCHIDCORRECTIONS now new
- BTCP rows will be created directly in OPH202A
08.10.2002 SH If BTCP_UNALLOCATED or BTCP_MOVETONEWBATCH is selected all buttons
- will be disabled which are responsible to book the payment
07.10.2002 SCR 2323 SH Add new parameter PI.BTCH_LASTLINEBTCP relevant for moved
- payments and enabled BTCP_MOVETONEWBATCH only if BTCP_BADPID >0
10.09.2002 SCR2130 SH Auto. updates to BTCP_AMOUNTCOSTSCURRACC and
- BTCP_AMOUNTCURRPAYMENT if one of them were entered
02.09.2002 SH Call OPH202B directly when coming back from OPH202D and no
- invoice was found in OPH202D --> for more info look into OPH202D
Implements new window manager calls
22.08.2002 Reset PI.BATCH_ID to 0 if batch was closed because we can't locate
on this batch in OPH201
19.08.2002 SH Disabled check for BTCP_AMOUNTCURPAYMENT <> 0 and used DATE()
- as argument for GB002, not the BTCH_DATE
15.08.2002 SH Display Name and address to dbetor heller now, before it was
- debtor client, now it's the same as in OPH202B
07.08.2002 SH Button "Delete bookings" can be used now by users
06.08.2002 SH Add new button "Delete bookings" only for developers
05.08.2002 SH Add new buuton "Buying groups"
1. Goto OPH202B directly after "Search DEBTOR/INVOICE" if an other debtor was
selected
2. Call OPH202A_001/002 "Select Debtor Heller/Client" only if relevant fields
- were left (FLOW = S), not each time if a button was pressed (FLOW = C)
3. Enable button "Invoices" only if a valid debtor client and debtor heller were
- entered by user or exist already in table BTCP
17.07.2002 Print BankID and BankAccount to the first line of the textviewer,
- need as INFO for the department
15.07.2002 SH Amounts could be entered now without decimals --> Use UFB547
1. Invoicenumbers will be entered now, only in capitals
1. If the automatic test failed we search for related debtors for the entered
invoicenumbers, if there are debtors exist in database we call OPH202B with
the unique debtor or if there are many debtors in database we dispaly a
selectionscreen to select one uniwue debtor to call OPH202B
2. SCR1563 Call ODHC01 Serach debtor with argument 6 = 'C', then the debtor
client search control will be activated auto in ODHC01.
1. Park Cursor on field "v.Invoicenumbers" if program called,
2. If the auto. test failed OPH202B will be called directly, the messagebox:
"Handling not possible" is now disabled
3. Disabled the confirmation screen to book the BATCH, was only for tests
10.04.2002 SH Changed call to ODHC01 --> new program
25.03.2002 SH Call BPH250 over #GB701 (submit server job)
-- SCR#415 --> 11.12.2001 SH (Search Invoice, new searchparameters)
-- SCR#416 --> 13.12.2001 SH (Search Debtor, new searchparameters)
-- SCR#420 --> 17.12.2001 SH (Book payment with negative differences)
-- SCR#552 --> 20.12.2001 SH (DebtorHeller/DebtorClient are mandatory)
-- SCR#609 --> 23.01.2002 SH (Call to GM100 Display Archiv documents)
-- SCR#716 --> 31.01.2002 SH (Extended test to enable UNALLOCATED)
-- PI.Called from OCM200A4 = 'Y' when it's called from OCM200A4,
-- only QUERY-MODE is allowed, all tests (Close Batch, test payment)
-- or the calls to other programs (e.g. Invoices, Search Debtor, ....)
-- are deactivated!
-- NO DESCRIPTION IN OPH202A --> IN THE SPECIFICATIONS --
-- Detailed permissions
... uses to handel legal collection debtors
-- relevant for div. Calls to other programs
-- Invoicenumbers sending back from automatic test payment handling (BPH104)
-- relevant for display, when coming back from other programs
-- ony relevant to book automaticly the open difference
-- Virtuals uses to book corrections
-- Virtuals uses for OPH202B6
-- Shortcut labels
... get permissions to handle legal collection debtors
-- Translate LOGICAL_NAME for UPD TextViewer, the LogicalName
-- does not extract by calling extarnal programs per function UDP
-- Shortcut handling
... not if called from OPH201 desktop
-- Only relevant for "Payment corrections" --> Create new payment
-- Only, when it's not called from OCM200A4 and no add corrections will be
-- handled
-- Every time when it's called from payments screen (P) or
-- after handling of the last payment with BTCP_STATUS=0, when it's
-- called from desktop screen (D), we try to close the BATCH
-- Store current client values, need to dispaly for next payment
-- previous payment, need to initialize some fields for the new payment
-- Update parameters to handle directly the new created payment
-- Used to EXITpayment after pressing Button Cancel with check and
save entries
-- Parameter back from OPH202D --> if OPH202D was closed by user
call directly OPH202B (Logic see OPH202D)
-- If virtual = 1 the debtor search scrren has to be restarted automatically
-- Used to enable/disable some Checkboxes and Buttons
-- Used to enable/disable Button "Import spec"
-- Used to check if user changed from normal client to intercredit client or
-- Used if auto. Test (BPH104) failed, to call OPH202B
-- Used to give info "Client has END status" to users only once if OPH202A was
-- Used to give info "Payments for unknown invoices must be booked at
administration" to users only once if OPH202A was started
-- Used to give info "This is a legal collection debtor" to users only once if
OPH202A was started
-- Used to call OSP006 - Client info
-- Number of BTCP rows added in OPH202C Split payment
-- Test if payment can handled auto., Button Test automatic pressed
-- Take Appart Invoice Numbers
-- reset virtual
-- Test automatic payment handling
-- automatic payment handling possible, storing payment
-- automatic payment handling not possible, call directly OPH202B
-- Prepare some values for the detected debtor by BPH104, uses to call
OPH202B. If BPH104 was called after an invoice search and auto. handling
was not possible, use debtor values from invoice search
-- A debtor client was selected
-- Handling not possible, no debtor was selected/entered by user
-- Call OPH202B if BTCP_DEBH_INITIAL and BTCP_DEBC_DEBC_INITIAL exits
-- or a debtor was detected by BPH104
-- If payment can close, v.WhatToMain is set to '' in the below BLOCK
-- 'close payment'!
-- End Block --> Test if payment can handled auto.
-- GOTO invoices --> OPH202B, Button Invoices pressed
-- If payment can close, v.WhatToMain is set to '' in the below BLOCK
-- 'close payment'!
-- Goto buying groups --> OPH202D, Button Buying groups
-- Get actual BTCP amounts for the check if payment can be closed
-- Set v.WhatToDMain ='S' to check if payment can be closed

Text.val: -- Check Storno BTCP- row
-- Uses for special handling of STORNOS --> Get next payment
For message "Storno not allowed because correct next payment does not exist"
-- Use to decide if current payment fields have to be updated (not for
correction batches)
-- Check BTCP_ADMNO_INITIAL
-- Check BTCP_CLNTNO_INITIAL
-- If payment is partially booked, then it's not allowed to change the clients
where CLNT201_INTERCREDIT is not the same
-- Paymenthandling not allowed for client with END status
-- Client not allowed for this currency
-- Not allowed to change the administration number of the draft
-- Check BTCP_DEBC_DEBC
-- Check BTCP_DEBH_NO
-- Check BTCP_DEBC_DEBC or BTCP_DEBH_NO mandatory and
have to be releated together
-- Not allowed to book foreign currency payments as unallocated (special test for RO ING)
-- If users have no write permission to handle legal collection debtor, ask if
payment has to move to new batch
... only if it's possible to move
.. move payment to new batch not possible because payment already handeld or
an intercredit client was selected or ....
-- If Amount bankaccount currency <> 0 the field Amount payment currency
has to be > 0
-- Amount payment currency <> 0 not allowed
-- Check BTCP_CURRENCYPAY --> must input
-- If the difference between actual rate and entered rate is > 10 %
(only if BTCP_CURRENCYPAY is changed and <> client currency)
-- If bankcosts > 10% of payment amount, the users have to confirm if it's
correct, else error
-- If the payment currency is the same as the bankaccount currency it is not
allowed that the payment amount is different from the bankaccount amount
-- STORNO PART
-- Storno not allowed for payments from old system (BTCP_STORNO_BTCH_ID = 1)
-- Storno not allowed for FCI clients
-- Storno not allowed because client currency is changed
-- Storno not allowed for unallocated payments
-- Storno not allowed because correct next payment does not exist
-- Check if Storno possible --> Storno payment must exist in database
-- Check if Storno possible --> "Amounts have to be equal"
-- Check if Storno possible --> "Currencys have to be equal"
- Check if Storno possible--> "Payment is not fully handled yet"
- Check if Storno possible--> "Storno not allowed because the debtor is deleted"
SPECIAL HANDLING FOR STORNOS
-- Move some values from stornoed payment row to the next payment if
exists
-- Set debtor values of active BTCP row = debtor values of storno BTCP row
(only if BTCP_AMOUNTCURRPAYMENT (current payment /next payment *-1) is equal)
-- Set intercredit flag to false
-- END BLOCK -- STORNO PART
